result.value:
# YAML 1.2
---
title: "Text mining on the Royal Library newspaper corpus"
abstract: "Texcavator allows you to use full-text search on the newspaper archive of the Dutch Royal Library. On top of that, it allows for visualizations like word clouds, time lines and heat maps. It also provides services to enhance your search experience like filtering, stopword removal, normalization and stemming."
authors:
  -
    affiliation: "Utrecht University"
    family-names: Klis
    given-names: Martijn
    name-particle: "van der"
  -
    affiliation: "University of Amsterdam"
    family-names: Laan
    given-names: Fons
  -
    affiliation: "Netherlands eScience Center"
    family-names: Zwaan
    given-names: "Janneke M."
    name-particle: "van der"
    orcid: "https://orcid.org/0000-0002-8329-7000"
  -
    affiliation: "Utrecht University"
    family-names: Gonggrijp
    given-names: Julian
  -
    affiliation: "Netherlands eScience Center"
    family-names: Buitinck
    given-names: Lars
  -
    affiliation: "Netherlands eScience Center"
    family-names: Bos
    given-names: Patrick
  -
    affiliation: "Utrecht University"
    family-names: Kruif
    given-names: "José"
    name-particle: de
  -
    family-names: Sassmann
    given-names: Mario
cff-version: "1.0.3"
license: "Apache-2.0"
message: "If you use this software, please cite it using these metadata."
repository-code: "https://github.com/UUDigitalHumanitieslab/texcavator"
version: "v1.2.3"
date-released: 2018-10-02
doi: "10.5281/zenodo.1442760"
...
Text mining on the Royal Library newspaper corpus
You can find instructions for deploying Texcavator in ``deployment.rst``

**This project is no longer maintained and has been archived. It is succeeded by I-Analyzer, which is actively developed: https://github.com/UUDigitalHumanitieslab/I-analyzer.**

Copyright '`Digital Humanities lab` @ Utrecht University',`Netherlands eScience Center`_, `University of Amsterdam`_. 

From 2015 onwards developed by the `Digital Humanities lab`_, Utrecht University.

.. _`Netherlands eScience Center`: https://www.esciencecenter.nl/
.. _`University of Amsterdam`: http://www.uva.nl/en/
.. _`Digital Humanities lab`: http://dig.hum.uu.nl/

The documentation for Texcavator is in Sphinx_. You can generate the documentation by running::

    make html

in the /doc/ directory.

.. _Sphinx: http://sphinx-doc.org/index.html
You can find instructions for deploying Texcavator in ``deployment.rst``

result.description: Prerelease for adding citation information + DOI.
result.name: v1.2.3-pre

result.description: Release for adding citation information + DOI.
result.name: v1.2.3

result.description: This is, for the time being, the final release of Texcavator by the Digital Humanities lab at Utrecht University. Bug reports, feature requests and other comments are of course still welcome, but we can no longer guarantee these will be picked up.
result.name: Release 1.2

result.description: This release fixes issues #142 and #150. Also, updated the requirements to the latest and greatest.
result.name: Milestone 10, hotfix 2

result.description: This hotfix release fixes issue #144.
result.name: Milestone 10, hotfix 1

result.description: This release contains all issues resolved in [Milestone 10](https://github.com/UUDigitalHumanitieslab/texcavator/issues?q=milestone%3A%22Milestone+10%22).
result.name: Milestone 10

result.description: This release contains all issues resolved in [Milestone 9](https://github.com/UUDigitalHumanitieslab/texcavator/issues?q=milestone%3A%22Milestone+9%22). This includes new heatmap functionality and ShiCo integration.
result.name: Milestone 9

result.description: Stops Safari from refreshing on search submit (#124) and makes it possible to reach the admin panel again (#125).
result.name: Milestone 8, hotfix 2

result.description: Hotfix to resolve #121.
result.name: Milestone 8, hotfix 1

result.description: This release contains all issues resolved in [Milestone 8](https://github.com/UUDigitalHumanitieslab/texcavator/issues?q=milestone%3A%22Milestone+8%22). Ideally, this is the last release before the 1.0 release.
result.name: Milestone 8

result.description: Hotfix to resolve issue #106.
result.name: Milestone 7, hotfix 1

result.description: This release contains all issues resolved in [Milestone 7](https://github.com/UUDigitalHumanitieslab/texcavator/issues?q=milestone%3A%22Milestone+7%22). Also, we'll migrate the production server (http://texcavator.surfsaralabs.nl) to a new virtual machine (on the [HPC Cloud](https://userinfo.surfsara.nl/systems/hpc-cloud)) and another ElasticSearch cluster (version 1.7 instead of 1.4).
result.name: Milestone 7

result.description:
Known issues:
- Metadata overview for newspapers doesn't work, this needs a re-indexing (it should however work on the development environment).
- Stemming doesn't yet work, this needs a re-indexing (it should however work on the development environment).
result.name: Milestone 6

result.description:
Known issues: 
- Word cloud generation should be more stable (but please notify us if not).
- Metadata overview for newspapers doesn't work, this needs a re-indexing (it should however work on the development environment).
- Stemming doesn't yet work, this needs a re-indexing (it should however work on the development environment).
result.name: Milestone 5

result.description:
This hotfix release should fix #76. 

Known issues: 
- Word cloud generation should be more stable (but please notify us if not).
- Metadata overview for newspapers doesn't work, this needs a re-indexing (it should however work on the development environment).
- Stemming doesn't yet work, this needs a re-indexing (it should however work on the development environment).
result.name: Milestone 4, hotfix 1

result.description:
This release contains all issues resolved in [Milestone 4](https://github.com/UUDigitalHumanitieslab/texcavator/issues?q=milestone%3A%22Milestone+4%22).

Known issues: 
- Word cloud generation should be more stable (but please notify us if not).
- Metadata overview for newspapers doesn't work, this needs a re-indexing (it should however work on the development environment).
- Stemming doesn't yet work, this needs a re-indexing (it should however work on the development environment).
result.name: Milestone 4

result.description:
This release contains all issues resolved in [Milestone 3](https://github.com/UUDigitalHumanitieslab/texcavator/issues?q=milestone%3A%22Milestone+3%22).

Known issues: 
- Word cloud generation should be more stable (but please notify us if not).
- Word clouds in timelines might not be created (see #49).
- Metadata overview for newspapers doesn't work, this needs a re-indexing.
- Stemming doesn't yet work, this needs a re-indexing.
result.name: Milestone 3

result.description:
This release contains all issues resolved in [Milestone 2](https://github.com/UUDigitalHumanitieslab/texcavator/issues?q=milestone%3A%22Milestone+2%22).

Known issues: 
- Word cloud generation is unstable. 
- Metadata overview for newspapers doesn't work, this needs a re-indexing.
- Stemming doesn't yet work, this needs a re-indexing.
result.name: Milestone 2

result.description:
This is a release of fixes for some serious bugs discovered during Milestone 2.

Hotfixes: 
- Export now works for queries with spaces (#40). 
- Scans now works for complex queries (#30). 
- Downloading is now more user-friendly (#20). 
- A + instead of "AND" is added when you click a word in the word cloud (#35).
- Prev/next buttons have been added below the search results (#37).
- Export messages should be somewhat clearer now. 

Known issues: 
- Word cloud generation is unstable. 
- Metadata overview for newspapers doesn't work, this needs a re-indexing.
result.name: Milestone 1, hotfix 2

result.description:
Hotfixes: 
- Export works again (albeit in the foreground) 
- Nicer error message for duplicate query titles

Known issues: 
- Metadata overview for newspapers doesn't work, this needs a re-indexing.
result.name: Milestone 1, hotfix 1

result.description: This release contains all issues resolved in [Milestone 1](https://github.com/UUDigitalHumanitieslab/texcavator/issues?q=milestone%3A%22Milestone+1%22).
result.name: Milestone 1

result.description: This was the last release by the [eScience center](https://www.esciencecenter.nl/).
result.name: Beta release 0.9
